metadata.title: CVE-2023-46047 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue in Sane 1.2.1 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary codevia a crafted file to the sanei_configure_attach() function. NOTE: this isdisputed because there is no expectation that the product should bestarting with an attacker-controlled configuration file.

criterions.comment: sane-backends package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
